general.question: Why do you want to work for this company?
How do you cope with pressure?
Why are you leaving your job?
What are your goals for the future?
What can you offer our company?
What do you do when you make a mistake at work?
What is your biggest career goals?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Have you ever had conflicts with coworkers or bosses? How did you handle it?
Why do you think you're the right person for this job?
What do you expect from this position?
How would you handle an impossible deadline?
What would you do if you disagreed with your manager?

developer.question: Which programming language are you most proficient in? Can you explain a project where you used it?
How do you structure your code to ensure maintainability and scalability?
Describe a complex bug you solved. How did you approach the problem?
Have you ever optimized a slow-performing system? What techniques did you use?
How do you handle feedback in code reviews?
Do you contribute to open-source projects or have a GitHub portfolio?
How do you manage technical debt in a project? Can you share an example?
What’s your approach to debugging a problem you’ve never seen before?
What’s your process for reviewing someone else’s code? What do you look for?
Have you ever missed a deadline? What happened, and how did you handle it?
Describe a recent technical concept you've learned. How did you apply it (or plan to)?

designer.question: What is your approach to creating interfaces that are both functional and visually appealing?
How do you handle feedback from users and stakeholders regarding design?
Do you prefer working with wireframes or high-fidelity prototypes? Why?
Tell me about a project where you had to balance aesthetics and usability.
Which design tools do you use most in your daily work?
How do you ensure visual consistency in a digital product?
Describe a situation where you had to defend your design choices.
What was the biggest design challenge you faced and how did you overcome it?
How do you collaborate with developers to implement your design?
Which design trends do you consider most relevant today?

project manager.question: How do you define priorities in a project with limited resources?
Tell me about a situation where you had to deal with conflicts between stakeholders.
How do you measure the success of a project?
Which agile methodologies have you used and which do you prefer?
How do you keep the team motivated during long or challenging projects?
Have you ever had to deal with a delayed project? How did you act to correct it?
How do you balance business needs and the technical capabilities of the team?
What was the most complex project you’ve ever managed?
How do you ensure clear communication between different project areas?
What do you do when you realize a project will not meet its objectives?

quality assurance.question: What is the difference between manual and automated testing? When would you use each?
Which test automation tools have you used?
How do you ensure product quality under tight deadlines?
Describe a critical bug you found and how it was handled.
Have you worked with performance or load testing?
How do you organize test cases to ensure proper coverage?
Tell me about a time you found a problem that developers hadn’t noticed.
What is your strategy for testing a feature with unclear documentation?
Which metrics do you consider important for evaluating software quality?

data analyst.question: Which tools and languages do you use for data analysis?
Tell me about a project where you used data to support a business decision.
How do you ensure the quality and reliability of the data you use?
Have you ever had to deal with very large databases? How did you overcome the challenges?
What is your experience with data visualization?
Explain a machine learning model you have implemented.
How do you handle missing or inconsistent data?
Tell me about a case where data analysis led to an unexpected insight.
Have you ever worked with real-time data pipelines?
How do you communicate analysis results to non-technical people?

tutorial.question: Why did you quit your last job?
